channel.title: Chromium :: Learn With Shantanu
channel.description: To install headless Chrome on Ubuntu, you can use the following steps: Install Dependencies: sudo apt update sudo apt install -y wget apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl gnupg Download and Install Google Chrome: First, download the Google Chrome package and add the Google Chrome repository to your system: wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb sudo dpkg -i google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.debIf you encounter any dependency issues, you can run the following command to resolve them: sudo apt -f install Install the ChromeDriver:
